text: Baluna, ‘amara allah‌te o amadera prati ya nayila hayeche ebam ib‌rahima, isama’ila, isahaka, iya’kuba o tamra bansadharaganera prati ya nayila hayechila ebam ya musa, ‘isa o an'yan'ya nabiganake tamdera rabera paksa theke pradana kara hayechila tate imana enechi; amara tamdera kara'o madhye kono taratamya kari na. Ara amara tamra'i kache atmasamarpanakari.’
